name: Onades
description:
Survive constant waves of attack!

Game made alone in 48h for Ludum Dare 51. Theme was "every 10 seconds".

Controls:

  • Point and click/hold to shoot.
  • Up/Down/M: Volume controls. 

Made using my own engine, in C++, using SDL2, OpenGL, OpenAL, Dear ImGui.

Ludum Dare game page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/onades
